descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Swing Into the Action with Breachers™!
Experience heart-pounding, tactical multiplayer combat where strategy meets chaos. Choose your side—Enforcer or Revolter—and immerse yourself in thrilling close-quarters battles. With stunning environments and dynamic gameplay, Breachers™ promises endless excitement.

**Why You’ll Love Breachers™:**

[media]
🔥**Intuitive Gameplay, Limitless Fun**

Master your gadgets and customize your arsenal for unique combat experiences. Each match brings fresh challenges and opportunities for tactical brilliance.

[media]
🚀 **BREACH AS AN ENFORCER**
- **Mission:** Eliminate enemies and disarm bombs with an EMP.
- **Tactics:** Rappel, blow up walls, and surprise opponents using drones, cloaking devices, and breaching foam.

[media]
⚔️ **AMBUSH AS A REVOLTER**
- **Mission:** Prevent enemies from disarming your bomb.
- **Tactics:** Fortify your position with doorblockers, trip mines, and proximity sensors.

[media]
🔫​ **CUSTOMIZE YOUR WEAPONRY**

At the start of each round, purchase and customize an extensive arsenal to fit your playstyle. From pistols to SMGs, shotguns to assault rifles, every weapon can be modified with attachments and adorned with stunning skins from the armory.

[media]
🌍**EXPLORE DIVERSE MAPS**

Battle in varied environments, from urban skyscraper rooftops to Arctic research facilities. Frequent content updates ensure fresh challenges await!

# Join the Action Today!
**CROSS-BUY ENABLED!** Get the Quest version and receive the Rift version for FREE! Don’t miss out on this opportunity to unleash your tactical prowess.
